content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":33442,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e4e58d6a-9d31-4a76-a904-511ffb062554/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e4e58d6a-9d31-4a76-a904-511ffb062554/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e4e58d6a-9d31-4a76-a904-511ffb062554\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":481,\"height\":452.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Health care in Poland is Insurance based and is delivered through a publicly funded health care system called the Narodowy Fundusz Zdrowia (NFZ). You can buy additional private medical insurance in Multikafeteria in EPAM or for your own money.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More information on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRGM/Guide+to+Living+in+Poland\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the settlement guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and additional onboarding training (TBU) \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
